name: Arcades - Defenders
description: Walls/defender tribal. Chunky blockers, Asymmetric board wipes. Possible infinite combo.

name: Yidris - Storm
description: 4C storm using cantrips, flashback, tutors and mana doubling. Uses graveyard recursion and cascade to generate mana and cards.

name: Licia - Lifegain
description: Lifegain/lifeloss combined with voltron. Utilizing mardu removal and lots of incidential lifegain.

name: Queza - Draw/Wheels
description: Lots of card draw, drain and lifegain. Draw your deck and drain your opponents doing so.

name: Denry - Counters
description: Copy all counters (first strike, vigilance, +1/+1 etc.) onto other creatures on etb. Using azorius value creatures.

name: Klothys - Group Slug
description: Punish abilities, spells and land drops. Double damage, and recur lands from your graveyard.

name: Subira - Aggro
description: Deploy lots of creatures/creature tokens and use subiras ability to refill your hand.

name: Lurrus - Permanents
description: Deck consists of exclusively permanents with cmc<=2 for lurrus' ability. Strong removal and voltron package.

name: Garth - Value
description: Untap effects combined with land enchantments to produce lots of mana/untap valueable creatures (garth).

name: Kumena - Merfolk
description: Merfolk tribal utilizing untap/tap effects combined with simic card draw and ramp.

name: Tana Tevesh - Aristocrats
commander_name: Tana, the Bloodsower/Tevesh Szat, Doom of Fools
